channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Bad pothole near the top of Keynsham Street close to the bookies, 31st December
item.description:
The pothole is now a few inches deep and is disintegrating even more. It has been there for months but has got noticeably worse over the last two. It is also scattering loose tarmac across the road. It is unsafe for people both on bikes and in cars, especially heading out onto a busy main road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Keynsham Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
